headline: Marathon Petroleum (MPC) Registers a Bigger Fall Than the Market: Important Facts to Note
summary: In the closing of the recent trading day, Marathon Petroleum (MPC) stood at $170.78, denoting a -2.65% move from the preceding trading day.

headline: Marathon Petroleum Corp. Announces Quarterly Dividend
summary: The board of directors of Marathon Petroleum Corp. (NYSE: MPC) has declared a dividend of $0.91 per share on common stock. The dividend is payable Sept. 10, 2025, to shareholders of record as of the close of business Aug. 20, 2025.
